title: I Researched Amazon KDP Niches for You (My Honest Findings)
description:
Are you thinking of publishing a self-help book on Amazon KDP? In this video, I share self-help book ideas and keyword research to help you on your self-publishing journey. 

Niche Research Tool (KDSPY): https://bit.ly/3J6NM4x

Join my Newsletter for more insider tips, strategies, and info:
